App Configuration Documentation
FileSystem_FATFS_RTOS_FATFS003 App

App Configuration Documentation

The diagram shows the UI for the App.

GUI Configuration URI Description
Tiny FS Configuration fatfs003_tiny_fs When it is set to 1, FatFs uses the sector buffer in the file system object instead of the sector buffer in the individual file object for file data transfer. This reduces memory consumption 512 bytes each file object.
Unit : NA
Range: NA
FS ReadOnly Configuration fatfs003_fs_readonly Setting to 1 defines read only configuration. This removes writing functions, f_write, f_sync, f_unlink, f_mkdir, f_chmod, f_rename, f_truncate and useless f_getfree.
Unit : NA
Range: NA
FS Minimize Configuration fatfs003_fs_minimize This option defines minimization level to remove some functions.
 0: Full function.
1: f_stat, f_getfree, f_unlink, f_mkdir, f_chmod, f_truncate and f_rename are removed.
2: f_opendir and f_readdir are removed in addition to 1.
3: f_lseek is removed in addition to 2.
Unit : NA
Range: NA
String Func Configuration fatfs003_use_strfunc To enable string functions, set it to 1 or 2.
Unit : NA
Range: NA
Use MKFS Configuration fatfs003_use_mkfs To enable f_mkfs function, set this option to 1 and set Enable read only option to 0
Unit : NA
Range: NA
Use Forward Configuration fatfs003_use_forward To enable f_forward function, set this option to 1 and set Enable Tiny FS to 1.
Unit : NA
Range: NA
Fast Seek Configuration fatfs003_fast_seek To enable/disable fast seek feature.
Unit : NA
Range: NA



GUI Configuration URI Description
Code Page Configuration fatfs003_code_page To select the OEM code page to be used on the Target system.
Unit : NA
Range: NA
Relative Path Configuration fatfs003_relative_path This option configures relative path feature.
0: Disable relative path feature and remove related functions.
1: Enable relative path. f_chdrive() and f_chdir() are available.
2: f_getcwd() is available in addition to 1.
Unit : NA
Range: NA



GUI Configuration URI Description
Volumes Configuration fatfs003_volumes This allows a user to set number of volumes(logical drives).
Unit : NA
Range: 1-2
Maximum Sector Size fatfs003_max_ss Maximum sector size to be handled. Always set 512 for memory card and hard disk but a larger value may be required for floppy disk (512/1024) and optical disk (512/2048).
Unit : NA
Range: NA
Multi Partition Configuration fatfs003_multi_partition To enable/disable Multi Partition.
Unit : NA
Range: NA
Erase Configuration fatfs003_erase To enable/disable erase feature.
Unit : NA
Range: NA



GUI Configuration URI Description
Word Access Configuration fatfs003_word_access Defines which access method is used to the word data on the FAT volume.
Unit : NA
Range: NA
File Sharing Configuration fatfs003_fs_share The value defines how many files can be opened simultaneously.
Unit : NA
Range: 20
Timeout Configuration fatfs003_timeout This allows a user to set Timeout period in unit of time ticks. Value should not exceed more than 10000.
Unit : ms
Range: 0-10000
